title: Research and Plan a Life OS AI with RAG Architecture
description: Develop a comprehensive plan for a life operating system AI using retrieval-augmented generation.

steps.description: Define the core functionalities and user requirements of the AI.
Research what methods are best to fulfill these capabilities
Determine the necessary data sources and pipeline for retrieval-augmented generation.
Test the datasources and pipeline to embed a simple codebase
Now test the embeddings with the AI agent to see if it answers accurately
Find a better embedding model to capture more semantic meaning

title: Codebase Chunking and GPT API Integration
description: A Python script to divide the codebase into sections and enrich with GPT API.

steps.description: Define a function to read and iterate through files in the codebase.
Iterate through the codebase and input each function to ChatGPT for commenting.
Modify the function to save code chunks as a JSON file with metadata for the database.
Implement chunking for all programming languages, including QML, in the script.
Chunk code files into manageable sections for processing.
Embed the Chunks and Conduct preliminary tests to validate the method's viability.
Insert final comments in the code and QML files before splitting them into chunks.

title: Implement Claude Code into Coding Flow
description: Integrate Claude code into an existing coding workflow for improved efficiency.

steps.description: Obtain the latest version of Claude code from the repository.
Review the existing coding flow and identify integration points.
Test the Claude code separately to ensure it functions correctly.
Modify the coding flow to include Claude code where needed.
Update any necessary documentation to reflect the changes.
Conduct integration testing to verify the implementation.
Gather feedback from the team and make adjustments if required.

title: AI Agent Plan for Codebase Understanding
description: Develop a strategy to enhance the AI Agent's comprehension of the codebase using advanced techniques.

steps.description: Brainstorm with ChatGPT to create a strategy for enhancing AI Agent's codebase understanding.
Create a structured goal hierarchy to outline the AI Agent's learning objectives.
Add projects and tasks to the task planner for better AI Agent codebase understanding.
Create code chunks flows from the actions in Narrative OS file
Learn Langraph to effectively model and visualize code flows.
Utilize deep learning models for code embedding representations.
Incorporate code summarization techniques for clarity.
Integrate semantic analysis to capture code intent.
Create a feedback loop for refining understanding with user input.
Test AI Agent capabilities with various code samples.

title: Create GitHub Repositories and Move Projects
description: This task involves creating GitHub repositories and transferring existing projects into them.

steps.description: Install Git on your device to manage your repositories.
Initialize Git, add remote repo, stage files, commit, and push to GitHub.
